Schedule

User List

The list of users being migrated, and the schedule for each one. The default is Now.

Schedule

You can load or save a schedule. You can also schedule via the Windows Task Scheduler.

Provisioning

You can set the password and Class of Service for unprovisioned users. Unprovisioned users will appear in red in the Users listbox.

Load

You can load an existing schedule.

Save

You can save the schedule created here.

Migrate

Hit this button to begin the Migration. You will be moved to the Results view, where you can view statistics for individual user migrations.
